subject: Re: About the Chadds Ford House
author: lisbyfarrum
full_text:
Ralph--I've sent several messages to your private e-mail. Have you
received them?

Ann

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Ralph Smith" <Ralphsmi@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Ann,
> 
>  I sent you an email I don't know if recieved it yet or not about the 
> Chadds Ford case. Our group would be interested in seeing if we can 
> help them. Also with any help from people in this group. Just wanted 
> to see what you think about it. Our group pays strict attention to all
> privacy. I have learned alot from a Podcast on Ghost to Ghost PM with 
> Mike Coletta and his guest Bruce Halliday about the Ghost Box and 
> opening a portal with the thing that I emailed about. The shadowy 
> figure that followed me home that I think came through the Box. Oh 
> well Ann have a great day and everyone on here too.
> 
> Regards,
> 
> Ralph Smith
> Spirit Paranormal Investigation Team of Central PA
>
